title: Set alias for columns in data set but alias name does not appear in expression builder after selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed instead of the alias name.
EB: According to SCR 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data source and a dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder.
5. Select the dataset and double click on the first column name.
